title: 开服问题
author: csl781
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

replies.author: TK_shitou
replies.txt_content: 打开 server.properties 文件把 port= 改成0--65535之间就解决了
